name: Whirlwind
effect: Wind Based. Low Priority 6. Never Fail. Can hit Aerial targets using Fly, Bounce or Sky Drop. The target is forced to the bottom of the turn order and cannot call for the use of Priority or Reaction moves for the next two Rounds (but may still use attacking moves on their turn as if they did not have Priority).
description: The Pokemon creates a powerful wind current that swirls the enemy around and sends it flying away.
